thread.title: OT Preview: Lakeview welcomes in Hesperia in "Fans' Choice Game of the Week"
thread.title_full: OT Preview: Lakeview welcomes in Hesperia in "Fans' Choice Game of the Week"

author: Joe Buczek
title: OT Preview: Lakeview welcomes in Hesperia in "Fans' Choice Game of the Week"
text:
JoeBuczek@9and10news.com 
LAKEVIEW – With the Central State Activities Association Silver Division on the line, an undefeated Hesperia squad will visit Lakeview Friday night as our “Fans’ Choice Game of the Week,” leading off the Double Overtime portion our Sports Overtime. 
For our “Overtime on the Road” matchup, Petoskey (4-2, 2-1 BNC) hosts No. 9 Gaylord (5-1, 2-1 BNC) in a battle for second place in the Big North Conference. "It's nice to be at home, but to me, it's a matter of what you do Monday through Thursday,” Petoskey coach Kerry VanOrman said. “Gaylord is having a great season. Both teams having winning records, so I think it makes it even more special." 
We'll have a live preview from Petoskey on Friday's 9&10 News at 6 p.m. 
These are just two of the 16 local games that we plan to show Friday night on Sports Overtime. 
SHANNON McGRATTAN 
Gaylord at Petoskey – 7 p.m. 
IAN OLIVER 
Brimley at Pellston – 7 p.m.
